creator: roku@apache.org
text:
Please also take care of the publication's specific i18n catalogues i.e. in
lenya/pubs/default/lenya/resources/i18n/cms_ui.xml .

The files only contains 3 or 4 keys.

Would be great if u could have a look.

Created attachment 11256
cmsui_es.xml (spanish i18n files for lenya and pubs/default)
creator: jose.jesus.chaso.gonzalez@dmr-consulting.com
roku@apache.org
text:
Jose,

sorry, but I can not open ur attached file since it seems to be a binary file.
Any ideas? Maybe u have not set the correct mime type when creating the attachment?

creator: jose.jesus.chaso.gonzalez@dmr-consulting.com
text:
I told it to be attached as a binary file since it is a binary compressed tar-gz
file

Rename the file to .tar.gz and it should work

If still remain the problem let me know to retry the attachment

Thanx

PD: Both files are translated, the common for all lenya pubs and the default
specific. In fact the tar file should decompress each file to its right location
inside the src branch if extracted from the directory containig the src/ subdir.
